ComicInfo.Series: Hammer of the Gods: Hammer Hits China
ComicInfo.Summary:
Do the Wrong Thing: A reincarnated monster comprised of the parts from some crooked cops and one honest cop rescues a family.
Hammer Hits China Part 2: Modi tells stories of Asgard and Midgard at the behest of the temple witch.
ComicInfo.Title: Do the Wrong Thing; Hammer Hits China Part 2
